thread.section_title: ClearBags Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ClearBags | clearbags.com | 17 of 474
thread.title: YAGMUR

author: YAGMUR
title: YAGMUR
text:
They sent my two lots order in Priority envelope and the envelope was folded in half and damaged when it arrived. I would prefer receiving them in a box, so the carrier could not fold it. I was lucky that they were still usable.
Additional to that the boxes that I bought have a window and they send the poly sheet separately. It is very hard to glue them to the boxes since the boxes are already assembled. I wish they give an option whether you want the poly sheet assembled or not. However, they have free sample offer, I suggest to use that before you order something. I got samples for another box and thought that I don't need to order this one as a sample because the quality of the boxes was really good.
Besides those, the quality is really good.
